MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.HIDDEN_FLAT_CHECK: DC 11 flat check required for targeting
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.CONCEALED_FLAT_CHECK: DC 5 flat check required for targeting
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.UNDETECTED_CONDITION: Undetected condition applied with full mechanical effects
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.VISIBLE_NO_EFFECTS: No penalties when targeting; no additional effects
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.HIDDEN_TOOLTIP: Hidden: You are off-guard to the target and must succeed at a DC 11 flat check when targeting with an attack, spell, or other effect
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.CONCEALED_TOOLTIP: Concealed: You must succeed at a DC 5 flat check when targeting with an attack, spell, or other effect
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.UNDETECTED_TOOLTIP: Undetected: You don't know the target's location. You are off-guard to the target and you can't easily target it. Using the Seek action can help find an undetected creature
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.BLINDED_OVERRIDE: All creatures appear Hidden due to Blinded condition
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.DAZZLED_OVERRIDE: All creatures appear Concealed due to Dazzled condition
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.NO_COVER_TOOLTIP: No Cover: No bonuses or penalties
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.LESSER_COVER_TOOLTIP: Lesser Cover: +1 circumstance bonus to AC
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.STANDARD_COVER_TOOLTIP: Standard Cover: +2 circumstance bonus to AC, Reflex saves, and Stealth checks. Can Hide behind this cover.
MECHANICAL_EFFECTS.GREATER_COVER_TOOLTIP: Greater Cover: +4 circumstance bonus to AC, Reflex saves, and Stealth checks. Can Hide behind this cover.

TOKEN_MANAGER.TITLE: Visioner Manager
TOKEN_MANAGER.NO_TOKENS: No tokens available in this scene

SENSES.LIGHT-PERCEPTION_DESC: You can perceive light and darkness. This sense allows you to see in natural darkness but is affected by magical darkness.
SENSES.VISION_DESC: Your standard visual sense used to perceive your surroundings.
SENSES.DARKVISION_DESC: You can see in darkness and dim light just as well as in bright light, though you can't distinguish color in darkness.
SENSES.GREATER-DARKVISION_DESC: You can see in darkness and dim light as if it were bright light—colors included.
SENSES.HEARING_DESC: You can detect creatures and events via sound within range (imprecise).
SENSES.TREMORSENSE_DESC: You can sense vibrations through the ground within range (imprecise).
SENSES.SCENT_DESC: You have an enhanced sense of smell, allowing you to detect living creatures within range (imprecise).
SENSES.ECHOLOCATION_DESC: You can use sound to navigate and detect objects within range (precise).
SENSES.LIFESENSE_DESC: You can sense the life force of living and undead creatures within range (imprecise).

SPECIAL_SENSES.vision_description: Your standard visual sense used to perceive your surroundings.
SPECIAL_SENSES.lifesense_description: You have a limited ability to sense life force. You gain lifesense as an imprecise sense. This allows you to sense the life force of living and undead creatures within the listed range. The sense can distinguish between the vitality energy animating living creatures and the void energy animating undead creatures.
SPECIAL_SENSES.echolocation_description: You can use sound to navigate and detect objects. You gain echolocation as a precise sense. This allows you to detect all creatures and objects within range through sound reflection.
SPECIAL_SENSES.tremorsense_description: You can sense vibrations through the ground. You gain tremorsense as an imprecise sense. This allows you to detect creatures and objects in contact with the ground within range.
SPECIAL_SENSES.scent_description: You have an enhanced sense of smell. You gain scent as an imprecise sense. This allows you to detect living creatures by their scent within range.
SPECIAL_SENSES.darkvision_description: You can see in darkness and dim light just as well as in bright light, though you can’t distinguish color in darkness.
SPECIAL_SENSES.greater_darkvision_description: You can see in darkness and dim light as if it were bright light—colors included.
SPECIAL_SENSES.hearing_description: You can detect creatures and events via sound within range (imprecise).
SPECIAL_SENSES.low_light_vision_description: You can see in dim light as though it were bright light.
SPECIAL_SENSES.infrared_vision_description: You can perceive heat signatures in your surroundings.
SPECIAL_SENSES.truesight_description: You can see things as they truly are, ignoring illusions and invisibility within range.
SPECIAL_SENSES.see_the_unseen_description: You can perceive otherwise unseen phenomena within range.
SPECIAL_SENSES.bloodsense_description: You can detect the presence and location of creatures by sensing blood within range.
SPECIAL_SENSES.magicsense_description: You can sense magical auras or effects within range.
SPECIAL_SENSES.motion_sense_description: You can detect motion in your surroundings within range.
SPECIAL_SENSES.spiritsense_description: You can sense the presence of spirits and undead within range.
SPECIAL_SENSES.thoughtsense_description: You can detect nearby thinking creatures within range.
SPECIAL_SENSES.wavesense_description: You perceive vibrations or waves through a medium within range.

AVS_OVERRIDE_DIALOG.NO_OVERRIDES: No AVS overrides are currently active for this token.

VISUAL_EFFECTS.CONCEALED_OVERLAY: This token is concealed from you
VISUAL_EFFECTS.CONCEALED_FLAT_CHECK: DC 5 flat check required for targeting
VISUAL_EFFECTS.UNDETECTED_CONDITION: Undetected condition applied with full mechanical effects
VISUAL_EFFECTS.CONCEALED_TOOLTIP: Concealed: You must succeed at a DC 5 flat check when targeting with an attack, spell, or other effect
VISUAL_EFFECTS.UNDETECTED_TOOLTIP: Undetected: You don't know the target's location. You are off-guard to the target and you can't easily target it. Using the Seek action can help find an undetected creature
VISUAL_EFFECTS.DAZZLED_OVERRIDE: All creatures appear Concealed due to Dazzled condition
VISUAL_EFFECTS.NO_COVER_TOOLTIP: No Cover: No bonuses or penalties
VISUAL_EFFECTS.GREATER_COVER_TOOLTIP: Greater Cover: +4 circumstance bonus to AC, Reflex saves, and Stealth checks. Can Hide behind this cover.

NOTIFICATIONS.NO_OBSERVER_SELECTED: Please select an observer token first
NOTIFICATIONS.MULTIPLE_OBSERVERS: Multiple observer tokens selected - please select only one
NOTIFICATIONS.NO_SOCKETLIB_INSTALLED: PF2E Visioner needs socketlib module to be active in order to auto-refresh client screens. Please activate it.
NOTIFICATIONS.PERMISSION_DENIED: Only GMs can manage token visibility and cover
NOTIFICATIONS.SNEAK_CLEAR_GM_ONLY: Only GMs can clear sneak flags
NOTIFICATIONS.SCENE_CLEAR_GM_ONLY: Only GMs can clear Visioner scene data
NOTIFICATIONS.DATA_CLEAR_GM_ONLY: Only GMs can clear Visioner data
NOTIFICATIONS.SNEAK_CLEARED: PF2E Visioner: Cleared all sneak flags.
NOTIFICATIONS.SNEAK_CLEAR_FAILED: PF2E Visioner: Failed to clear sneak flags. See console.
NOTIFICATIONS.SCENE_DATA_CLEARED: PF2E Visioner: Cleared all scene data.
NOTIFICATIONS.SCENE_CLEAR_FAILED: PF2E Visioner: Failed to clear scene data. See console.
NOTIFICATIONS.TOKEN_DATA_CLEARED: PF2E Visioner: Cleared all token data.
NOTIFICATIONS.TOKEN_CLEAR_FAILED: PF2E Visioner: Failed to clear token data. See console.
NOTIFICATIONS.ALL_CACHES_CLEARED: All caches cleared and visibility recalculated
NOTIFICATIONS.SELECT_TWO_TOKENS: Select exactly 2 tokens: observer and target
NOTIFICATIONS.SCENE_CONFIG_RESET: Scene Config flag reset - updates should resume
NOTIFICATIONS.AVS_UNAVAILABLE: PF2E Visioner | Auto-visibility system not available
NOTIFICATIONS.NEED_BOTH_TOKENS: Need both observer and target tokens
NOTIFICATIONS.SELECT_TWO_TOKENS_OR_PARAMS: Select exactly 2 tokens or provide observer and target parameters
NOTIFICATIONS.NO_DEFERRED_TOKENS: No deferred tokens found to undefer.
NOTIFICATIONS.NO_UNDEFERRED_TOKENS: No undeferred tokens found to restore to deferred state.
NOTIFICATIONS.NO_TOKEN_ID: No token ID found on button
NOTIFICATIONS.END_TURN_FAILED: Failed to apply end-of-turn visibility changes.
NOTIFICATIONS.NO_DEFERRED_POSITIONS: No deferred position checks to validate.
NOTIFICATIONS.NO_DEFERRED_OUTCOMES: No deferred outcomes found to validate.
NOTIFICATIONS.PARTY_RESTORE_FAILED: PF2E Visioner: Failed to restore party tokens
NOTIFICATIONS.PARTY_RESTORE_SUCCESS: PF2E Visioner: Restored state for {count} party tokens
NOTIFICATIONS.OVERRIDE_CLEAR_FAILED: Failed to clear overrides for this table
NOTIFICATIONS.NO_ENCOUNTER_TOKENS: {moduleId}: No encounter tokens found. Filter disabled.
NOTIFICATIONS.NO_VALID_CONSEQUENCES: No valid targets found for Attack Consequences. you can only see consequences if you are Hidden or Undetected from at least one observer.
NOTIFICATIONS.SNEAK_DEFERRED_RESTORED: Restored {count} token(s) to original deferred state with all position data

TOOLTIPS.KEEN_EYES: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using Seek (System application). Undetected creatures treated as Hidden, Hidden creatures treated as Observed when you Seek.
TOOLTIPS.THAT_FEATURE: You spot hidden doors, traps, and hazards more easily (failure will become a success).

SEEK_AUTOMATION.BUTTON_TOOLTIP: Apply visibility changes based on Seek results
SEEK_AUTOMATION.NO_UNDETECTED_TOKENS: No hidden or undetected tokens found for {name}'s Seek action
SEEK_AUTOMATION.NO_CHANGES: No visibility changes needed for {name}'s Seek action
SEEK_AUTOMATION.ERROR_PROCESSING: Error applying Seek results. Check console for details.
SEEK_AUTOMATION.OPEN_RESULTS_TOOLTIP: Open the Seek results dialog to apply individual or bulk visibility changes
SEEK_AUTOMATION.SETUP_TEMPLATE_TOOLTIP: Click to place a 15-foot burst anywhere; Seek will use tokens within it
SEEK_AUTOMATION.SETTING_HINT: Automatically add buttons to Seek chat messages for applying visibility changes
SEEK_AUTOMATION.RANGE_LIMIT_ACTIVE: Range limit active: Only showing targets within 30 feet
SEEK_AUTOMATION.RANGE_LIMIT_ACTIVE_CUSTOM: Range limit active: Only showing targets within {distance} feet
SEEK_AUTOMATION.NO_TARGETS_IN_RANGE: No valid targets within 30 feet range
SEEK_AUTOMATION.NO_TARGETS_IN_RANGE_CUSTOM: No valid targets within {distance} feet range
SEEK_AUTOMATION.ECHOLOCATION_TOOLTIP: Precise hearing active until the start of your next turn
SEEK_AUTOMATION.LIFESENSE_TOOLTIP: Can sense living and undead creatures within range (imprecise sense)
SEEK_AUTOMATION.SENSE_UNSEEN_TOOLTIP: Use your Sense the Unseen feat to make undetected creatures hidden

SENSE_THE_UNSEEN.name: Sense the Unseen
SENSE_THE_UNSEEN.description: Even though you failed at the triggering check, you automatically sense any Undetected creatures in the area where you're Seeking, making them merely Hidden to you.
SENSE_THE_UNSEEN.trigger: You fail a Seek to find an undetected creature
SENSE_THE_UNSEEN.effect: Make undetected creatures hidden to you

HIDE_AUTOMATION.BUTTON_TOOLTIP: Apply visibility changes based on Hide results
HIDE_AUTOMATION.NO_OBSERVERS: No observers found for {name}'s Hide action
HIDE_AUTOMATION.NO_CHANGES: No visibility changes needed for {name}'s Hide action
HIDE_AUTOMATION.ERROR_PROCESSING: Error applying Hide results. Check console for details.
HIDE_AUTOMATION.OPEN_RESULTS_TOOLTIP: Open the Hide results dialog to apply individual or bulk visibility changes
HIDE_AUTOMATION.SETTING_HINT: Automatically add buttons to Hide chat messages for applying visibility changes

BADGES.VANISH_INTO_THE_LAND_TOOLTIP: You can Hide and Sneak even without cover or concealment in your chosen difficult terrain
BADGES.CAMOUFLAGE_TOOLTIP: Cover/concealment requirement is bypassed in natural terrain
BADGES.DISTRACTING_SHADOWS_TOOLTIP: You may use larger creatures as cover for Hide/Sneak prerequisites

SNEAK_AUTOMATION.BUTTON_TOOLTIP: Apply visibility changes based on Sneak results
SNEAK_AUTOMATION.NO_OBSERVERS: No tokens can see {actor} - no sneak needed
SNEAK_AUTOMATION.NO_CHANGES: Sneak had no effect on visibility
SNEAK_AUTOMATION.OPEN_RESULTS_TOOLTIP: Open the Sneak results dialog to apply individual or bulk visibility changes
SNEAK_AUTOMATION.SETTING_HINT: Automatically add buttons to Sneak chat messages for applying visibility changes

BADGES.VANISH_INTO_THE_LAND_TOOLTIP: You can Sneak even without cover or concealment in your chosen difficult terrain
BADGES.CAMOUFLAGE_TOOLTIP: Cover/concealment requirement is bypassed in natural terrain
BADGES.DISTRACTING_SHADOWS_TOOLTIP: You may use larger creatures as cover for Hide/Sneak prerequisites

CREATE_A_DIVERSION_AUTOMATION.BUTTON_TOOLTIP: Apply visibility changes from Create a Diversion action
CREATE_A_DIVERSION_AUTOMATION.NO_OBSERVERS: No tokens can see {actor} - no diversion needed
CREATE_A_DIVERSION_AUTOMATION.NO_CHANGES: Create a Diversion had no effect on visibility
CREATE_A_DIVERSION_AUTOMATION.ERROR_PROCESSING: Error processing Create a Diversion results
CREATE_A_DIVERSION_AUTOMATION.OPEN_RESULTS_TOOLTIP: Open the Create a Diversion results dialog to apply individual or bulk visibility changes
CREATE_A_DIVERSION_AUTOMATION.SETTING_HINT: Automatically add buttons to Create a Diversion chat messages for applying visibility changes

ENABLE_HOVER_TOOLTIPS.name: Enable Hover Tooltips
ENABLE_HOVER_TOOLTIPS.hint: Show visibility status tooltips when hovering over tokens

ALLOW_PLAYER_TOOLTIPS.name: Allow Player Tooltips
ALLOW_PLAYER_TOOLTIPS.hint: When enabled, players can see visibility indication tooltips from their perspective when hovering over tokens

TOOLTIP_FONT_SIZE.name: Tooltip Size
TOOLTIP_FONT_SIZE.hint: Choose tooltip size (affects icon and border size; text adjusts accordingly)

AUTO_VISIBILITY_ENABLED.name: Enable Auto-Visibility System
AUTO_VISIBILITY_ENABLED.hint: Automatically set visibility flags based on lighting conditions and creature senses. This system will analyze scene lighting, token positions, and creature abilities to determine appropriate visibility states (observed, concealed, hidden, undetected).

AUTO_VISIBILITY_DEBUG_MODE.name: Auto-Visibility Debug Mode
AUTO_VISIBILITY_DEBUG_MODE.hint: Enable detailed console logging for the auto-visibility system. Useful for troubleshooting visibility calculations.

DISABLE_LINE_OF_SIGHT.name: Disable Line of Sight Raycasting
DISABLE_LINE_OF_SIGHT.hint: Disable line-of-sight raycasting for visibility. When enabled, visibility will only be calculated for selected tokens using their vision shapes. Visibility results within the visibility shape will be more accurate, but darkvision and unselected token results will only use distance and senses, ignoring walls and obstacles.

COLORBLIND_MODE.name: Colorblind Mode
COLORBLIND_MODE.hint: Select a colorblind mode to adjust colors for better visibility (client-side setting)

IGNORE_ALLIES_DEFAULT.name: Set Default "Ignore Allies" State
IGNORE_ALLIES_DEFAULT.hint: Determines whether the Ignore Allies checkbox in Visioner Manager/Action dialogs starts enabled or disabled but can still be toggled manually

HIDE_FOUNDRY_HIDDEN_TOKENS.name: Set Default "Hide Foundry Hidden" State
HIDE_FOUNDRY_HIDDEN_TOKENS.hint: Determines whether the Hide Foundry Hidden checkbox in Visioner Manager/Action dialogs starts enabled or disabled but can still be toggled manually

SNEAK_ALLOW_HIDDEN_UNDETECTED_END_POSITI.name: Allow Hidden/Undetected for Sneak End Position
SNEAK_ALLOW_HIDDEN_UNDETECTED_END_POSITI.hint: When enabled, Sneak end positions will also qualify if the target is Hidden or Undetected (in addition to the default Concealed). A plus icon will appear in the dialog to indicate this extended qualification.

ENABLE_ALL_TOKENS_VISION.name: Vision for NPCs
ENABLE_ALL_TOKENS_VISION.hint: Enables token vision for all NPC tokens to more easily see point of view

GDV_VISUAL_OVERRIDE_ENABLED.name: Greater Darkvision Visual Override
GDV_VISUAL_OVERRIDE_ENABLED.hint: Client-only: When your selected token has Greater Darkvision, lighten darkness areas so visuals match Visioner rules.

GDV_OVERLAY_ALPHA.name: GDV Overlay Intensity
GDV_OVERLAY_ALPHA.hint: Client-only: How strongly to counteract darkness tint for Greater Darkvision (0–1).

GDV_TOKEN_GRAYSCALE.name: GDV: Black & White Tokens
GDV_TOKEN_GRAYSCALE.hint: Client-only: When seeing via (greater) darkvision, render tokens in grayscale to match rules text (black and white vision).

DEFAULT_ENCOUNTER_FILTER.name: Set Default "Encounter Only" State
DEFAULT_ENCOUNTER_FILTER.hint:
Determines whether the Encounter Only checkbox in Visioner Manager/Action dialogs starts enabled or disabled but can still be toggled manually
(This checkbox only appears in dialogs during encounters)

LIMIT_SEEK_RANGE.name: Limit Combat Seek Range
LIMIT_SEEK_RANGE.hint: Target will be decided based on the specified distance from token using Seek while in combat

SEEK_USE_TEMPLATE.name: Use Seek Template
SEEK_USE_TEMPLATE.hint: When Seeking, targets will be decided using a 15-foot burst template. Template button replaces standard Visioner buttons in Seek chat card

LIMIT_SEEK_RANGE_OUT_OF_COMBAT.name: Limit Exploration Seek Range
LIMIT_SEEK_RANGE_OUT_OF_COMBAT.hint: Target will be decided based on the specified distance from token using Seek while out of combat

CUSTOM_SEEK_DISTANCE.name: Combat Seek Range:
CUSTOM_SEEK_DISTANCE.hint: Maximum Distance for Seek in combat

CUSTOM_SEEK_DISTANCE_OOC.name: Exploration Seek Range:
CUSTOM_SEEK_DISTANCE_OOC.hint: Maximum Distance for Seek out of combat

USE_HUD_BUTTON.name: Use Token HUD Button
USE_HUD_BUTTON.hint: When enabled, adds a visibility button to the token HUD. When disabled, uses a floating button when tokens are selected.

BLOCK_PLAYER_TARGET_TOOLTIPS.name: Block Target Tooltips for Players
BLOCK_PLAYER_TARGET_TOOLTIPS.hint: When enabled, players won't see tooltips when hovering over tokens in target mode (how others see the hovered token). They can still see tooltips when holding O key or pressing Alt.

REMOVE_PLAYER_TARGET_TOOLTIPS.name: Remove Target Hover Tooltips from Players
REMOVE_PLAYER_TARGET_TOOLTIPS.hint: Stops players from seeing hover tooltips from target perspective for owned tokens

REMOVE_PLAYER_OBSERVER_TOOLTIPS.name: Remove Observer Hover Tooltips from Players
REMOVE_PLAYER_OBSERVER_TOOLTIPS.hint: Stops players from seeing observer-perspective hover tooltips (O key / observer mode)

INTEGRATE_COVER_VISIBILITY.name: Integrate Cover with Visibility Rules
INTEGRATE_COVER_VISIBILITY.hint: When enabled, certain actions follow cover prerequisites. For example, Hide is only allowed if the acting token has at least Standard Cover from an observer.

INTEGRATE_ROLL_OUTCOME.name: Integrate roll outcome in the token manager
INTEGRATE_ROLL_OUTCOME.hint: Adds a column to the Token Manager to show the last relevant roll result vs current DC and outcome.

ENFORCE_RAW.name: Enforce RAW
ENFORCE_RAW.hint: When enabled, certain actions follow prerequisites. For example, Hide is only allowed if the acting token is Concealed or has Standard Cover from an observer.

DEBUG.name: Debug Mode
DEBUG.hint: Enable detailed console logging for troubleshooting

LOOT_PERCEPTION_DC.name: Default Perception DC for Loot Actors
LOOT_PERCEPTION_DC.hint: Used when a loot token needs a Perception DC and doesn't have a system stat.

LOOT_STEALTH_DC.name: Loot Actor Stealth DC
LOOT_STEALTH_DC.hint: Default DC used when using Seek to find hidden Loot Actors. Stealth DC can be changed in the Loot Actor's token settings

WALL_STEALTH_DC.name: Wall Stealth DC
WALL_STEALTH_DC.hint: Default DC used when using Seek to find hidden Walls. Stealth DC can be changed in the Wall's settings

HIDE_QUICK_EDIT_TOOL.name: Hide Quick Edit Tool
HIDE_QUICK_EDIT_TOOL.hint: If enabled, the Quick Edit tool will be hidden from the token controls toolbar.

INCLUDE_LOOT_ACTORS.name: Hidden Loot Actors
INCLUDE_LOOT_ACTORS.hint:
Allows configuring of loot actors conditional visibility states within the Visioner manager 
(visual only - no conditions)

INCLUDE_WALLS.name: Hidden Walls
INCLUDE_WALLS.hint: Allows configuring of walls conditional visibility states within the Visioner manager. Visual indicator when succeeding at Seek

HIDDEN_WALLS.name: Hidden Walls
HIDDEN_WALLS.hint: Allows configuring of walls conditional visibility states within the Visioner manager. Visual indicator when succeeding at Seek

AUTO_COVER.name: Enable Auto-Cover
AUTO_COVER.hint: Allows cover to be automatically applied based on token coverage in relation to walls and other tokens

EXPERIMENTAL_SEE_THROUGH_WALLS.name: Experimental: Per-Token See-Through Walls (Client-Only)
EXPERIMENTAL_SEE_THROUGH_WALLS.hint: When enabled on your client, selected token(s) will ignore walls you have marked as Observed in the Hidden Walls list. Visual-only and highly experimental.

SNEAK_RAW_ENFORCEMENT.name: Sneak Raw Enforcement
SNEAK_RAW_ENFORCEMENT.hint: When enabled, Sneak will follow RAW rules. When disabled, Sneak will be more forgiving.

TOKEN_HUD_BUTTON.name: Token HUD Button
TOKEN_HUD_BUTTON.hint: Adds a button to Foundry's token HUD for opening up the Visioner Manager. When disabled, a movable floating button will appear while a token is selected

VISIONER_SCENE_CONTROLS.name: Visioner Scene Controls
VISIONER_SCENE_CONTROLS.hint: Adds specific Visioner features as buttons to Token Controls and Wall Controls on the left sidebar. If disabled, features can still be accessed via individual token/wall settings or keybinds

HIDDEN_WALL_INDICATOR_WIDTH.name: Hidden Wall Indicator Width
HIDDEN_WALL_INDICATOR_WIDTH.hint: Default width (in pixels) for hidden wall visual indicators. This can be overridden per-scene in Scene Configuration. Larger values make hidden walls more visible on the canvas.

DIM_LIGHTING_THRESHOLD.name: Dim Lighting Threshold
DIM_LIGHTING_THRESHOLD.hint: Default threshold for determining dim lighting (0.0 to 1.0). Values below this threshold are considered dim light. This can be overridden per-scene in Scene Configuration.

AVS_CHANGES_INDICATOR_SIZE.name: AVS Changes Indicator Size
AVS_CHANGES_INDICATOR_SIZE.hint: Controls the size of the floating AVS changes indicator button and its tooltip.

MANAGER_ROLL_COMPARISON.name: Visioner Manager Roll Comparison
MANAGER_ROLL_COMPARISON.hint: Adds a roll comparison column to the Visioner Manager comparing the last relevant roll vs relevant DC

TOKEN_INTERSECTION_MODE.name: Token Ray Intersection Mode
TOKEN_INTERSECTION_MODE.hint: How cover is evaluated based on tokens as blockers

CHOICES.any: Any - Any intersection. Lesser Cover; Standard Cover if two sizes or larger than attacker and target
CHOICES.length10: 10% - Intersect 10% or more of blocker side
CHOICES.coverage: Side Coverage - Thresholds based on percentage of side coverage. 50% Standard/70% Greater
CHOICES.tactical: Tactical - Corner to corner calculation for more precise calculations

AUTO_COVER_IGNORE_UNDETECTED.name: Ignore Undetected Tokens
AUTO_COVER_IGNORE_UNDETECTED.hint: Undetected tokens, per Visioner effect, will not provide Auto-Cover

AUTO_COVER_VISUALIZATION_COMBAT_ONLY.name: Restrict Auto-Cover Visualization to Combat
AUTO_COVER_VISUALIZATION_COMBAT_ONLY.hint: Limits the use of Auto-Cover Visualization keybind to only be usable during an active combat

AUTO_COVER_GM_RESPECT_FOG.name: GM Token Auto-Cover Visualization
AUTO_COVER_GM_RESPECT_FOG.hint: GM will see the limits to the Auto-Cover Visualization based on token's vision

AUTO_COVER_IGNORE_DEAD.name: Ignore Dead Tokens
AUTO_COVER_IGNORE_DEAD.hint: Dead tokens will not provide Auto-Cover

AUTO_COVER_IGNORE_ALLIES.name: Ignore Ally Tokens
AUTO_COVER_IGNORE_ALLIES.hint: Ally tokens will not provide Auto-Cover

WALL_STANDARD_THRESHOLD.name: Wall Standard Threshold:
WALL_STANDARD_THRESHOLD.hint: Percent of the target token that must be blocked to grant Standard Cover

WALL_GREATER_THRESHOLD.name: Wall Greater Threshold:
WALL_GREATER_THRESHOLD.hint: Percent of the target token that must be blocked to grant Greater Cover

WALLS_ALLOW_GREATER.name: Walls Allow Greater Cover
WALLS_ALLOW_GREATER.hint: Allows walls to grant Greater Cover based on configurable threshold

IGNORE_PRONE_TOKENS.name: Ignore Prone Tokens
IGNORE_PRONE_TOKENS.hint: Prone tokens will not provide Auto-Cover

KEYBIND_OPEN_MANAGER_TARGET_MODE.name: Keybinding Opens Manager in Target Mode
KEYBIND_OPEN_MANAGER_TARGET_MODE.hint: Open Visioner Manager in Target mode rather than Observer via keybinding.

VISIONER_QUICK_EDIT_TOOL.name: Visioner Quick Edit Tool
VISIONER_QUICK_EDIT_TOOL.hint: Adds a button to Token Controls sidebar to open the Visioner Quick Edit tool. If disabled, the tool can be accessed with a keybind

UI.FILTER_BY_DETECTION_TOOLTIP: Only show tokens that are within the current viewport
UI.IGNORE_ALLIES_TOOLTIP: Hide allies from the results list
UI.HIDE_FOUNDRY_HIDDEN_TOOLTIP: Visually hide tokens that are Foundry-hidden (document.hidden)
UI.SHOW_ONLY_CHANGES_TOOLTIP: Show only rows with visibility changes
UI.ENCOUNTER_FILTER_TOOLTIP: Only show tokens in the current encounter
UI.REVERT_ALL_CHANGES: Revert all changes to original state
UI.NAME: Name
UI.HIDE_WALLS: Hide walls from the results list
UI.IGNORE_WALLS: Hide walls from the results list
UI.DEFER_TO_END_OF_TURN: Defer end position check to end of turn (Sneaky feat)
UI.CURRENTLY_DEFERRED: Currently deferred to end of turn (Sneaky feat)
UI.DEFERRED_ACTIONS_DISABLED: Actions disabled - deferred to end of turn
UI.REMOVE_DEFER_PROCESS_NOW: Remove defer and process this check now
UI.UNDEFER_ALL: Undefer all currently deferred tokens and restore their original state
UI.DEFER_ALL_ELIGIBLE: Defer all eligible position checks to end of turn
UI.PROCESS_DEFERRED_CHECKS: Process {count} deferred position check{s} for end-of-turn validation
UI.APPLY_NO_COVER_ALL: Apply no cover bonus to all observers
UI.APPLY_STANDARD_COVER_ALL: Apply standard cover bonus to all observers
UI.APPLY_GREATER_COVER_ALL: Apply greater cover bonus to all observers
UI.AVS_CHANGE_INFO: Movement or lighting changes can invalidate previously set visibility overrides. Review each AVS change below to decide whether to accept or reject it.
UI.ACCEPT_ALL_IN_TABLE: Accept all changes in this table
UI.CLICK_TO_SWITCH_MODE: Click to switch between Observer and Target modes
UI.WALL_COVER_AUTO: Automatic Detection - Wall provides cover based on coverage thresholds
UI.WALL_COVER_NONE: No Cover - Wall never provides cover regardless of thresholds
UI.WALL_COVER_STANDARD_MAX: Standard Cover Maximum - Wall provides up to standard cover based on thresholds
UI.WALL_COVER_GREATER_MAX: Greater Cover Maximum - Wall provides up to greater cover based on thresholds
UI.MARK_WALL_HIDDEN: Mark this wall as hidden from players
UI.SET_ALL_WALLS_OBSERVED: Set all listed walls as Observed
UI.SET_ALL_WALLS_HIDDEN: Set all listed walls as Hidden
UI.SHOW_ONLY_COVER_CHANGES_TOOLTIP: Show only rows with cover/visibility changes
UI.SET_ALL_WALLS_AUTO_COVER: Set all walls to Auto Cover
UI.SET_ALL_WALLS_NO_COVER: Set all walls to No Cover
UI.SET_ALL_WALLS_STANDARD_COVER: Set all walls to Standard Cover
UI.SET_ALL_WALLS_GREATER_COVER: Set all walls to Greater Cover
UI.WALL_TYPE_CYCLE_TOOLTIP: Left-click: next type | Right-click: previous type
UI.SELECT_WALL_AND_PAN: Select wall and pan to it
UI.START_POS_PREVIOUS_SNEAK: Start position qualification from previous sneak action
UI.START_POS_NOT_QUALIFIES: Start position does not qualify for sneak
UI.END_POS_CHECK_END_TURN: End position will be checked at end of turn (consecutive sneak)
UI.END_POS_NOT_QUALIFIES: End position does not qualify for sneak
UI.END_POS_QUALIFIES_EXTENDED: End position qualifies for sneak (Hidden/Undetected also allowed)
UI.CONCEALED_HIDDEN_UNDETECTED: Concealed, Hidden, or Undetected (extended rule active)
UI.TOGGLE_MODE_TOOLTIP: Click to switch between Observer and Target modes
UI.ONLY_SHOW_ENCOUNTER_TOOLTIP: Only show tokens in the current encounter
UI.HIDE_FOUNDRY_HIDDEN_DOCUMENT_TOOLTIP: Visually hide tokens that are Foundry-hidden (document.hidden)
UI.SHOW_ONLY_VISIBILITY_CHANGES: Show only rows with visibility changes
UI.WALL_COVER_AUTO_TOOLTIP: Automatic Detection - Wall provides cover based on coverage thresholds
UI.WALL_COVER_NONE_TOOLTIP: No Cover - Wall never provides cover regardless of thresholds
UI.WALL_COVER_STANDARD_TOOLTIP: Standard Cover Maximum - Wall provides up to standard cover based on thresholds
UI.WALL_COVER_GREATER_TOOLTIP: Greater Cover Maximum - Wall provides up to greater cover based on thresholds
UI.WALL_HIDDEN_TOOLTIP: Mark this wall as hidden from players
UI.AVS_CHANGE_INFO_TOOLTIP: Movement or lighting changes can invalidate previously set visibility overrides. Review each AVS change below to decide whether to accept or reject it.
UI.ACCEPT_ALL_CHANGES_IN_TABLE: Accept all changes in this table
UI.PREVIEW_POINT_OUT_CHANGES: Preview and apply Point Out visibility changes
UI.APPLY_WITHOUT_DIALOG: Apply all calculated changes without opening the dialog
UI.TOKEN_COVER_AUTO_TOOLTIP: Automatic Detection - Token provides cover based on coverage thresholds
UI.TOKEN_COVER_NONE_TOOLTIP: No Cover - Token never provides cover regardless of thresholds
UI.TOKEN_COVER_LESSER_TOOLTIP: Lesser Cover - Token always provides lesser cover
UI.TOKEN_COVER_STANDARD_TOOLTIP: Standard Cover - Token always provides standard cover
UI.TOKEN_COVER_GREATER_TOOLTIP: Greater Cover - Token always provides greater cover
UI.SEARCH_WALL_PLACEHOLDER: Search by identifier or wall ID...
UI.START_SNEAK_TOOLTIP: Start sneaking: capture current visibility and cover states
UI.APPLY_COVER_CHANGES_WITHOUT_DIALOG: Apply all calculated cover changes without opening the dialog
UI.BULK_ACTION_INFO: Apply action to all changes at once

OPEN_TOKEN_MANAGER.name: Open Visioner Manager
OPEN_TOKEN_MANAGER.hint: Open the token manager for selected tokens

OPEN_VISIBILITY_MANAGER.name: Open Token Visibility Manager
OPEN_VISIBILITY_MANAGER.hint: Open the visibility manager for selected tokens

HOLD_COVER_OVERRIDE.name: Hold to Override Cover on Quick Rolls
HOLD_COVER_OVERRIDE.hint: When held while clicking a strike/attack (no dialog), use Visioner cover override instead of auto-calculated cover. No default; configure your own key.

TOGGLE_OBSERVER_MODE.name: Toggle Observer Mode for Hover Tooltips
TOGGLE_OBSERVER_MODE.hint: Hold this key to switch hover tooltips to observer mode (how hovered token sees others)

OPEN_QUICK_PANEL.name: Open Visioner Quick Panel
OPEN_QUICK_PANEL.hint: Open the compact Visioner Quick Edit panel.

SHOW_AUTO_COVER_OVERLAY.name: Show Auto-Cover Overlay
SHOW_AUTO_COVER_OVERLAY.hint: Press to show auto-cover badges for the hovered token (or controlled token if none).

HOLD_COVER_VISUALIZATION.name: Hold for Cover Visualization
HOLD_COVER_VISUALIZATION.hint: Hold this key while hovering over tokens to visualize cover fields. Shows optimal positioning for attacks.

OPEN_WALL_MANAGER.name: Open Wall Manager
OPEN_WALL_MANAGER.hint: Open the Visioner Wall Manager dialog to bulk edit wall settings.

SHOW_VISIBILITY_FACTORS.name: Show Visibility Factors
SHOW_VISIBILITY_FACTORS.hint: Press to show detailed reasons for visibility states from controlled tokens to all other tokens.

VISIBILITY_FACTORS.NO_TOKEN_SELECTED: Select at least one token to show visibility factors
VISIBILITY_FACTORS.STORED_STATE: Visibility state is {state} (stored state - reason not captured)

REASONS.OBSERVER_BLINDED: Observer is blinded (cannot use visual senses)
REASONS.OBSERVER_DEAFENED_INVISIBLE: Observer is deafened (cannot hear invisible target)
REASONS.OBSERVER_DAZZLED: Observer is dazzled in bright light
REASONS.TARGET_IN_GREATER_DARKNESS_WITH_GREATER_: Target is in greater magical darkness ({templates}), but observer has greater darkvision
REASONS.TARGET_IN_GREATER_DARKNESS_WITH_DARKVISI: Target is in greater magical darkness ({templates}) - concealed even with darkvision
REASONS.TARGET_IN_GREATER_DARKNESS_NO_DARKVISION: Target is in greater magical darkness ({templates}), observer lacks darkvision
REASONS.TARGET_IN_MAGICAL_DARKNESS_WITH_DARKVISI: Target is in magical darkness ({templates}), but observer has darkvision
REASONS.TARGET_IN_MAGICAL_DARKNESS_NO_DARKVISION: Target is in magical darkness ({templates}), observer lacks darkvision
REASONS.TARGET_IN_DARKNESS_WITH_DARKVISION: Target is in darkness ({templates}), but observer has darkvision
REASONS.TARGET_IN_DARKNESS_NO_DARKVISION: Target is in darkness ({templates}), observer lacks darkvision
REASONS.OBSERVER_IN_GREATER_DARKNESS_WITH_GREATE: Observer is in greater magical darkness ({templates}), but has greater darkvision
REASONS.OBSERVER_IN_GREATER_DARKNESS_WITH_DARKVI: Observer is in greater magical darkness ({templates}) - limits vision even with darkvision
REASONS.OBSERVER_IN_GREATER_DARKNESS_NO_DARKVISI: Observer is in greater magical darkness ({templates}), lacks darkvision
REASONS.OBSERVER_IN_MAGICAL_DARKNESS_WITH_DARKVI: Observer is in magical darkness ({templates}), but has darkvision
REASONS.OBSERVER_IN_MAGICAL_DARKNESS_NO_DARKVISI: Observer is in magical darkness ({templates}), lacks darkvision
REASONS.OBSERVER_IN_DARKNESS_WITH_DARKVISION: Observer is in darkness ({templates}), but has darkvision
REASONS.OBSERVER_IN_DARKNESS_NO_DARKVISION: Observer is in darkness ({templates}), lacks darkvision
REASONS.DARKNESS_BETWEEN_WITH_GREATER_DARKVISION: Greater magical darkness between observer and target ({templates}), but observer has greater darkvision
REASONS.DARKNESS_BETWEEN_WITH_DARKVISION: Greater magical darkness between observer and target ({templates}) - obscures vision even with darkvision
REASONS.DARKNESS_BETWEEN_NO_DARKVISION: Greater magical darkness between observer and target ({templates}), observer lacks darkvision
REASONS.MAGICAL_DARKNESS_BETWEEN_WITH_DARKVISION: Magical darkness between observer and target ({templates}), but observer has darkvision
REASONS.MAGICAL_DARKNESS_BETWEEN_NO_DARKVISION: Magical darkness between observer and target ({templates}), observer lacks darkvision
REASONS.REGULAR_DARKNESS_BETWEEN_WITH_DARKVISION: Darkness between observer and target ({templates}), but observer has darkvision
REASONS.REGULAR_DARKNESS_BETWEEN_NO_DARKVISION: Darkness between observer and target ({templates}), observer lacks darkvision
REASONS.REGION_CONCEALMENT: Ray crosses concealment region boundary (e.g., magical darkness template)
REASONS.RAY_GREATER_DARKNESS_WITH_DARKVISION: Ray passes through greater magical darkness (rank {rank}) - concealed even with darkvision
REASONS.RAY_GREATER_DARKNESS_NO_DARKVISION: Ray passes through magical darkness (rank {rank}), observer lacks darkvision
REASONS.RAY_MAGICAL_DARKNESS_NO_DARKVISION: Ray passes through magical darkness (rank {rank}), observer lacks darkvision
REASONS.GREATER_MAGICAL_DARKNESS_WITH_DARKVISION: Greater magical darkness (rank {rank}) concealed even with darkvision
REASONS.TARGET_MAGICAL_DARKNESS_NO_DARKVISION: Target is in magical darkness (rank {rank}), observer lacks darkvision
REASONS.TARGET_IN_DARKNESS_NO_DARKVISION_SIMPLE: Target is in darkness, observer lacks darkvision
REASONS.TARGET_IN_DIM_NO_LOW_LIGHT: Target is in dim light, observer lacks low-light vision
REASONS.HEARD_INVISIBLE_HIDDEN: Heard with hearing (imprecise) - invisible creature is hidden
REASONS.BRIGHT_LIGHT_NORMAL_VISION: Target is in bright light with normal vision
REASONS.LOW_LIGHT_VISION_DIM: Low-light vision sees clearly in dim light
REASONS.GREATER_DARKVISION_THROUGH_MAGICAL_DARKN: Greater darkvision sees through magical darkness (rank {rank})
REASONS.TARGET_INVISIBLE_OBSERVER_DEAFENED: Target is invisible and observer is deafened
REASONS.TARGET_INVISIBLE_NO_SENSES: Target is invisible and cannot be detected by available senses
REASONS.TARGET_NO_SENSES: Target cannot be detected by any available senses

VISIBILITY_STATE.label: Visibility State
VISIBILITY_STATE.hint: The visibility state to apply between tokens inside and outside the region

APPLY_TO_INSIDE_TOKENS.label: Apply to Inside Tokens
APPLY_TO_INSIDE_TOKENS.hint: If enabled, tokens inside the region will have the visibility state applied to other tokens inside the region as well

TWO_WAY_REGION.label: Two-Way Region
TWO_WAY_REGION.hint: If enabled, tokens outside the region will also have the visibility state applied to tokens inside the region

CONCEALMENT_ENABLED.label: Enable Concealment
CONCEALMENT_ENABLED.hint: If enabled, rays that cross this region's boundaries will grant concealment to the target

REGION_BEHAVIOR.VISIBILITY_UPDATED: Region visibility updated for {count} token relationships
REGION_BEHAVIOR.UPDATE_ERROR: Failed to update region visibility relationships

SNEAKY_FEAT.TOOLTIP: Visibility capped at Hidden due to Sneaky feat effect. This creature successfully sneaked against you.

SNEAK_ADEPT_FEAT.TOOLTIP: Failure upgraded to Success due to Sneak Adept feat. It's almost impossible to spot this creature.
